ygData.subject: Re:   ICE
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpines CR chamber opened and he stepped out. He checked on the bot formerly known as Shadow Wing. Her chamber was never used. The wolfbot sensed trouble

From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Lunarpines CR chamber opened and he stepped out. He checked on the bot
formerly known as Shadow Wing. Her chamber was never used. The wolfbot
sensed trouble again. "Where's the crazy bot gone off to now?" with her past
track record she'd gone off to get herself in another situation that
Lunarpine would have to bail her out. Now though she was stronger, and could
probably handle herself a little better.

Veratis' Rejuvination chamber opened and the old bot once again arose from
his sleep. The chamber had been set to open when Lunarpine was healed.
Veratis stretched his wings and rewrapped them around him. He appeared to be
an old man in an old fashion dress cape that men wore to keep thier Sunday
best from getting dirty on the road in the 1700s. He returned to the lab and
found Lunarpine already studying the computer display. He took a moment to
study the situation. "Ice" had stopped for a rest, then continued on. Drops
of blood containing the virus lay on the ground where she had been. The open
air hadn't killed it. It wouldn't be destroyed until it was seperated from
the blood. He set his cleanup drones to do a sweep of the area and clean it
up before anything else was contaminated. He didn't know if normal organic
creatures could be infected but viruses had been known to mutate in the
past. Ice was now a danger to the whole planet.

"Take this scanner and bring her back." Veratis wanted to save the planet
from the destruction Trans life had caused, now he found he was protecting
it from himself. "Whatever you do don't shed any more of her blood." His
instructions were filled with a nervous fear.  Lunarpine took the scanner
and proceeded to the exit. the only chance the planet had now was that the
virus be stopped before it reached warm weather.

Outside the base Lunarpine transformed to full wolf mode and started after
Ice. The drones flew around him scrapeing up the droplets of blood that had
seeped through her bandages. "What have you gotten us into this time Wing?"
were the wolfs thoughts as he chased after her. Her name was now Ice but
she'd always be Shadow Wing to him.
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, November 10, 2000 8:24 AM
Subject: ICE


> Ice::
>
> She had been laying the snow, sleeping for some time. She was covered
> in new fallen snow. She lifted her head up and loked around. She saw
> that the landscape was totally white. She smiled and stood up. HEr
> shoulder was throbbing and still trickling blood. She looked down at
> where she was laying and saw a frozen puddle of red liquid in the
> snow. She shook off the rest of the snow off her body and started
> walking again. She headed north and just wakled along, in a calm
> manner, seeing what there was to see. She left a small trickle of
> blood in the snow as she walked, but would soon be coverd by the
> falling snow.
>
>
>
>
>
